data.oai_dc:dc: Species and threat distributions in the Daly River catchment

This file contains, for each of the 864 subcatchments delineated in the Daly River catchment, the spatial distribution of the 45 freshwater fish species and the proportion of each subcatchment covered by grazing (used as estimate of threat in this study). The file also contains the latitude and longitude of the centroid of each subcatchment, so the information can be spatially explored.
